statements: SELECT * FROM employee_activity;
SELECT employee_name, activity_description FROM employee_activity WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, login_time, logout_time FROM employee_activity WHERE employee_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM employee_activity WHERE login_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT employee_name, login_time, logout_time, activity_description FROM employee_activity ORDER BY logout_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_activity WHERE employee_id = 1 ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT employee_name, activity_description FROM employee_activity WHERE logout_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT employee_id, login_time, activity_description FROM employee_activity WHERE logout_time IS NULL;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, login_time, activity_description FROM employee_activity WHERE activity_description LIKE '%meeting%';
SELECT * FROM employee_activity ORDER BY employee_name ASC, login_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_activity;
SELECT employee_id, activity_type FROM employee_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT employee_id, location_name FROM employee_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, activity_type, activity_description FROM employee_activity WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM employee_locations;
SELECT * FROM employee_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM employee_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Workspace' ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;

SELECT employee_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp, activity_description FROM employee_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Break' AND activity_description LIKE '%coffee%' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_coordinates FROM employee_locations WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location_name ASC;

SELECT * FROM employee_locations el JOIN employee_activity ea ON el.employee_id = ea.employee_id WHERE ea.activity_type = 'Meeting' AND ea.activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ea.activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM RemoteEmployees;
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM RemoteEmployees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, remote_login_time FROM RemoteEmployees WHERE department_name='IT' ORDER BY remote_login_time DESC;
SELECT employee_name, remote_logout_time FROM RemoteEmployees WHERE remote_logout_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM RemoteEmployees;
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM RemoteEmployees WHERE department_name = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, remote_login_time FROM RemoteEmployees WHERE remote_login_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY remote_login_time ASC;

SELECT employee_name, activity_type, activity_time FROM RemoteEmployees INNER JOIN ActivityLogs ON RemoteEmployees.employee_id = ActivityLogs.employee_id WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY activity_time DESC;

SELECT employee_name, activity_type, alert_type, alert_time FROM RemoteEmployees INNER JOIN ActivityLogs ON RemoteEmployees.employee_id = ActivityLogs.employee_id INNER JOIN SecurityAlerts ON ActivityLogs.log_id = SecurityAlerts.log_id WHERE alert_type = 'Suspicious Login' ORDER BY alert_time ASC;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM RemoteEmployees GROUP BY department_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT * FROM remote_employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM remote_employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT activity_description, activity_time FROM activity_logs ORDER BY activity_time DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM security_events WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM device_logs WHERE online_status = TRUE;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM remote_employees WHERE remote_access = true;
SELECT * FROM activity_logs ORDER BY activity_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT employee_name, department, login_time, logout_time FROM remote_employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT device_type, last_connection_time FROM device_logs WHERE online_status = true AND device_type LIKE 'laptop%';

SELECT employee_name, event_type, event_description FROM remote_employees JOIN security_events ON remote_employees.employee_id = security_events.employee_id WHERE event_time >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT full_name, position FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM department ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT activity_description FROM employee_activity WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager');
SELECT full_name, email FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2021-01-01' ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='Marketing' ORDER BY full_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT full_name, email, position, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01' AND department='HR'
SELECT e.full_name, e.email, d.department_name FROM employees e JOIN department d ON e.department=d.department_id ORDER BY e.full_name ASC
SELECT e.full_name, e.email, a.activity_description, a.activity_timestamp FROM employees e JOIN employee_activity a ON e.employee_id=a.employee_id ORDER BY a.activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT e.full_name, e.department, s.log_details FROM employees e JOIN employee_activity a ON e.employee_id=a.employee_id JOIN security_logs s ON a.activity_id=s.activity_id WHERE a.activity_timestamp > '2022-03-01'
